rows.label: tlk44510181_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Ohhh, I can scarcely contain my
anger! Not the direct descendants
of Adel? Pah! Fie on them!

rows.label: tlk44510181_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Soon all of this will fade into
obscurity, just like Theospiti Temple.

rows.label: tlk44510181_02_msg0003
rows.name:
The story of the Blade sealed away
inside the temple...Adel's great and
numerous exploits... All of it, gone!

rows.label: tlk44510181_02_msg0004
rows.name:
O Adel... Please...grant us
the fortitude to make it
through these dark times...
